tool_description: Get the very latest ads and data with Adzuna's API. Get job, property and car ads for your own website. Use Adzuna's up-to-the-minute employment data to power your own website, reporting and data visualisations.
name: Adzuna
title: Adzuna

api_list.name: Average salary

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: ISO 8601 country code of the relevant country.

optional_parameters.name: what
optional_parameters.description: The keywords to search for. Use space or comma characters to separate multiple keywords.

optional_parameters.name: location0
optional_parameters.description: The locationN fields may be used to describe a location, in a similar form to that returned in a Adzuna::API::Response::Location object.

optional_parameters.name: location1
optional_parameters.description: See location0

optional_parameters.name: location2
optional_parameters.description: See location0

optional_parameters.name: location6
optional_parameters.description: See location0

optional_parameters.name: location7
optional_parameters.description: See location0

optional_parameters.name: where
optional_parameters.description: The geographic centre of the search. Place names or postal codes may be used.

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: The category tag, as returned by the "category" endpoint.

optional_parameters.name: months
optional_parameters.description: The number of months back for which to retrieve data.

api_list.name: Search cars

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: ISO 8601 country code of the relevant country.

optional_parameters.name: location5
optional_parameters.description: See location0

optional_parameters.name: results_per_page
optional_parameters.description: The number of results to include on each page of search results.

optional_parameters.name: what
optional_parameters.description: The keywords to search for. Use space or comma characters to separate multiple keywords.

optional_parameters.name: what_and
optional_parameters.description: The keywords to search for, all keywords must be found.

optional_parameters.name: what_phrase
optional_parameters.description: An entire phrase which must be found in the description or title.

optional_parameters.name: what_or
optional_parameters.description: Keywords to search for. Use space or comma characters to separate multiple keywords.

optional_parameters.name: what_exclude
optional_parameters.description: Keywords to exclude from the search. Use space or comma characters to separate multiple keywords.

optional_parameters.name: title_only
optional_parameters.description: Keywords to find, but only in the title. Use space or comma characters to separate multiple keywords.

optional_parameters.name: location0
optional_parameters.description: The locationN fields may be used to describe a location, in a similar form to that returned in a Adzuna::API::Response::Location object.

optional_parameters.name: location1
optional_parameters.description: See location0

optional_parameters.name: location2
optional_parameters.description: See location0

optional_parameters.name: location3
optional_parameters.description: See location0

optional_parameters.name: location4
optional_parameters.description: See location0

optional_parameters.name: location6
optional_parameters.description: See location0

optional_parameters.name: location7
optional_parameters.description: See location0

optional_parameters.name: where
optional_parameters.description: The geographic centre of the search. Place names or postal codes may be used.

optional_parameters.name: distance
optional_parameters.description: The distance in kilometres from the centre of the place described by the 'where' parameter.

optional_parameters.name: max_days_old
optional_parameters.description: The age of the oldest advertisment in days that will be returned.

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: The category tag, as returned by the "category" endpoint.

optional_parameters.name: sort_direction
optional_parameters.description: The order of search results (ascending or descending).

optional_parameters.name: sort_by
optional_parameters.description: The ordering of the search results.

optional_parameters.name: fuel_type
optional_parameters.description: The type of fuel the vehicle requires.

optional_parameters.name: transmission
optional_parameters.description: The type of transmission the vehicle has.

optional_parameters.name: body_type
optional_parameters.description: The type of body a vehicle has.

optional_parameters.name: engine_min
optional_parameters.description: The minimum engine capacity in cubic centimetres.

optional_parameters.name: engine_max
optional_parameters.description: The maximum engine capacity in cubic centimetres.

optional_parameters.name: colour
optional_parameters.description: The colour of the car

optional_parameters.name: mileage_min
optional_parameters.description: The minimum mileage of vehicles to be considered.

optional_parameters.name: mileage_max
optional_parameters.description: The maximum mileage of vehicles to be considered.

optional_parameters.name: year_min
optional_parameters.description: The earliest year to be considered.

optional_parameters.name: year_max
optional_parameters.description: The most recent year to be considered.

optional_parameters.name: seller_type
optional_parameters.description: The type of seller.

optional_parameters.name: price_min
optional_parameters.description: The minimum price we wish to get results for.

optional_parameters.name: price_include_unknown
optional_parameters.description: When using price_min and/or price_max set to "1", to include cars with unknown price in results.

optional_parameters.name: price_max
optional_parameters.description: The maximum price we wish to get results for.

api_list.name: Search properties

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: ISO 8601 country code of the relevant country.

optional_parameters.name: results_per_page
optional_parameters.description: The number of results to include on each page of search results.

optional_parameters.name: what
optional_parameters.description: The keywords to search for. Use space or comma characters to separate multiple keywords.

optional_parameters.name: what_and
optional_parameters.description: The keywords to search for, all keywords must be found.

optional_parameters.name: what_phrase
optional_parameters.description: An entire phrase which must be found in the description or title.

optional_parameters.name: what_or
optional_parameters.description: Keywords to search for. Use space or comma characters to separate multiple keywords.

optional_parameters.name: what_exclude
optional_parameters.description: Keywords to exclude from the search. Use space or comma characters to separate multiple keywords.

optional_parameters.name: title_only
optional_parameters.description: Keywords to find, but only in the title. Use space or comma characters to separate multiple keywords.

optional_parameters.name: location0
optional_parameters.description: The locationN fields may be used to describe a location, in a similar form to that returned in a Adzuna::API::Response::Location object.

optional_parameters.name: location1
optional_parameters.description: See location0

optional_parameters.name: location2
optional_parameters.description: See location0

optional_parameters.name: location3
optional_parameters.description: See location0

optional_parameters.name: location4
optional_parameters.description: See location0

optional_parameters.name: location6
optional_parameters.description: See location0

optional_parameters.name: location7
optional_parameters.description: See location0

optional_parameters.name: where
optional_parameters.description: The geographic centre of the search. Place names or postal codes may be used.

optional_parameters.name: distance
optional_parameters.description: The distance in kilometres from the centre of the place described by the 'where' parameter.

optional_parameters.name: max_days_old
optional_parameters.description: The age of the oldest advertisment in days that will be returned.

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: The category tag, as returned by the "category" endpoint.

optional_parameters.name: sort_direction
optional_parameters.description: The order of search results (ascending or descending).

optional_parameters.name: sort_by
optional_parameters.description: The ordering of the search results.

optional_parameters.name: beds
optional_parameters.description: The number of beds to search for. For values greater than five, this is considered to be minimum value, rather than the exact value to find.

optional_parameters.name: is_furnished
optional_parameters.description: One of "0" or "1", to indicate no or yes. If omitted, both types of property are found.

optional_parameters.name: price_min
optional_parameters.description: The minimum price we wish to get results for (for rental properties price is monthly).

optional_parameters.name: price_max
optional_parameters.description: The maximum price we wish to get results for (for rental properties price is monthly).

optional_parameters.name: price_include_unknown
optional_parameters.description: When using price_min or price_max set to "1", to include properties with an unknown price in results.

optional_parameters.name: property_type
optional_parameters.description: The type of property of interest.

optional_parameters.name: location5
optional_parameters.description: See location0

api_list.name: Search jobs

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: ISO 8601 country code of the relevant country.

optional_parameters.name: results_per_page
optional_parameters.description: The number of results to include on each page of search results.

optional_parameters.name: what
optional_parameters.description: The keywords to search for. Use space or comma characters to separate multiple keywords.

optional_parameters.name: what_and
optional_parameters.description: The keywords to search for, all keywords must be found.

optional_parameters.name: what_phrase
optional_parameters.description: An entire phrase which must be found in the description or title.

optional_parameters.name: what_or
optional_parameters.description: Keywords to search for. Use space or comma characters to separate multiple keywords.

optional_parameters.name: what_exclude
optional_parameters.description: Keywords to exclude from the search. Use space or comma characters to separate multiple keywords.

optional_parameters.name: title_only
optional_parameters.description: Keywords to find, but only in the title. Use space or comma characters to separate multiple keywords.

optional_parameters.name: location1
optional_parameters.description: See location0

optional_parameters.name: location2
optional_parameters.description: See location0

optional_parameters.name: location3
optional_parameters.description: See location0

optional_parameters.name: location4
optional_parameters.description: See location0

optional_parameters.name: location5
optional_parameters.description: See location0

optional_parameters.name: location6
optional_parameters.description: See location0

optional_parameters.name: location7
optional_parameters.description: See location0

optional_parameters.name: where
optional_parameters.description: The geographic centre of the search. Place names or postal codes may be used.

optional_parameters.name: distance
optional_parameters.description: The distance in kilometres from the centre of the place described by the 'where' parameter. Defaults to 10km.

optional_parameters.name: max_days_old
optional_parameters.description: The age of the oldest advertisment in days that will be returned.

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: The category tag, as returned by the "category" endpoint.

optional_parameters.name: sort_direction
optional_parameters.description: The order of search results (ascending or descending).

optional_parameters.name: sort_by
optional_parameters.description: The ordering of the search results.

optional_parameters.name: salary_min
optional_parameters.description: The minimum salary we wish to get results for.

optional_parameters.name: salary_max
optional_parameters.description: The maximum salary we wish to get results for.

optional_parameters.name: salary_include_unknown
optional_parameters.description: When using salary_min and/or salary_max set this to "1", to include jobs with unknown salaries in results.

optional_parameters.name: full_time
optional_parameters.description: If set to "1", only full time jobs will be returned.

optional_parameters.name: part_time
optional_parameters.description: If set to "1", only part time jobs will be returned.

optional_parameters.name: contract
optional_parameters.description: If set to "1", only contract jobs will be returned.

optional_parameters.name: permanent
optional_parameters.description: If set to "1", only permanent jobs will be returned.

optional_parameters.name: company
optional_parameters.description: The canonical company name. This may be returned in a Adzuna::API::Response::Company object when a job is returned. A full list of allowed terms in not available through the API.

optional_parameters.name: location0
optional_parameters.description: The locationN fields may be used to describe a location, in a similar form to that returned in a Adzuna::API::Response::Location object.
